@dev returns unclaimed tokens to the airdropper after the airdrop expires

nodes.documentation:
@dev user can signup to the Airdrop Central to receive token airdrops
Airdrops made before the user registration won't be available to them.
nodes.name: signUpForAirdrops

nodes.documentation:
@dev removes user from airdrop list.
Beware that token distribution for existing airdrops won't change.
For example: if 100 tokens were to be distributed to 10 people (10 each).
if one quitted from the list, the other 9 will still get 10 each.
@notice WARNING: Quiting from the airdrop central will make you lose
tokens not yet withdrawn. Make sure to withdraw all pending tokens before
removing yourself from this list. Signing up later will not give you the older tokens back
nodes.name: quitFromAirdrops

airdropTokens(address,uint256,uint256).details: Transfers tokens to contract and sets the Token Airdrop

params._expirationTime: is in how many seconds will the airdrop expire from now user should first know how many users are signed to know final approximate distribution
params._tokenAddress: is the address of the token
params._totalTokensToDistribute: is the tokens that will be evenly distributed among all current users Enter the number of tokens (the function multiplies by the token decimals)

approveSubmission(address,address).details: approves a given token and account address to make it available for airdrop This is necessary to avoid malicious contracts to be added.

params._airdropper: is the account to add to the whitelist
params._tokenAddress: is the token address to add to the whitelist

getTokensAvailableToMe(address).details: calculates the amount of tokens the user will be able to withdraw Given a token address, the function checks all airdrops with the same address

params._tokenAddress: is the token the user wants to check his balance for

quitFromAirdrops().details: removes user from airdrop list. Beware that token distribution for existing airdrops won't change. For example: if 100 tokens were to be distributed to 10 people (10 each). if one quitted from the list, the other 9 will still get 10 each.

removeFromBlacklist(address,address).details: removes a token and/or account from the blacklist to allow them to submit a token again.

params._airdropper: is the account to remove from blacklist
params._tokenAddress: is the token address to remove from blacklist

returnTokensToAirdropper(address).details: returns unclaimed tokens to the airdropper after the airdrop expires

params._tokenAddress: is the address of the token

revokeSubmission(address,address).details: removes token and airdropper from whitelist. Also adds them to a blacklist to prevent further submissions of any To be used in case of an emgency where the owner failed to detect a problem with the address submitted.

params._airdropper: is the account to add to the blacklist and remove from whitelist
params._tokenAddress: is the token address to add to the blacklist and remove from whitelist

setAdmin(address,bool).details: allows owner to grant/revoke admin privileges to other accounts

params._admin: is the account to be granted/revoked admin privileges
params.isAdmin: is whether or not to grant or revoke privileges.

setPaused(bool).details: pause or unpause the contract in case a problem is detected

signUpForAirdrops().details: user can signup to the Airdrop Central to receive token airdrops Airdrops made before the user registration won't be available to them.

signupUsersManually(address).details: allows admins to add users to the list manually Use to add people who explicitely asked to be added...

withdrawTokens(address).details: calculates and withdraws the amount of tokens the user has been awarded by airdrops Given a token address, the function checks all airdrops with the same address and withdraws the corresponding tokens for the user.

params._tokenAddress: is the token the user wants to check his balance for

airdropTokens(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Before calling this function, you must have given the Airdrop Central an allowance of the tokens to distribute. Call approve([this contract's address],_totalTokensToDistribute); on the AnasToken token cotnract first

quitFromAirdrops().notice: WARNING: Quiting from the airdrop central will make you lose tokens not yet withdrawn. Make sure to withdraw all pending tokens before removing yourself from this list. Signing up later will not give you the older tokens back
